author: Kelly Brenner
comment: It looks great and works well, BUT it constantly crashes on my phone and I have to dismiss it multiple times each day. It also seems to drain the battery much more than other watch faces. It also shows the wrong temperature consistently and never changes.

author: Chad Dawes
comment: This gave was great to begin with. After a few updates and the lagging started. Now it is so bad, I can't use it.          *EDIT* New update brought it back to life. Using it now and bumped it up to 4 stars. It does still lag a bit, but it could be my Moto360 1st gen causing that.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Chad ,Thank you for your kind patience and hope on us , It helps us to work and improve further please consider other watch faces of us ,Thank you for your time once again

title: Great looking but lags... Not anymore!

author: Andrei Gherzan
comment: The boat is moving every one second and the seconds increment by 3. When I installed this watchface, it crashed my watch and restarted. Entering menu take suspiciously long. Good idea but pretty bad implementation.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Andrei! Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue We'd like to look into it further for you to get it set up soon ,Kindly send us a email at wearables@insideglobe.com with your order id ,so that we can process further ,Thank you for your time

title: Unusable laggy

author: Francesco Cusolito
comment: A very nice idea, that still need some bugfixing and optimization. By now, the face isn't usable on my Gear Live, but the art concept is stunning, and the developer's promises to fix the animation make me believe that one day I'll be able to use this face, so I will not request a refund.   EDIT: the developers fixed many bugs, and now doesn't crash anymore. Unfortunately it's still too slow on my watch specially during swiping in and out of main screen, and can't be used daily.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Francesco ,Thank you for the updated review we are working on it we will soon fix the bug keep in touch ,Thank you

author: Chris Andersson
comment: But it lags on Moto 360 so unfortunately it's a refund for me.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Chris ,We apologize to you for facing this issue! WE would process your order, we like to know further more from you send us mail to wearables@insideglobe.com to fix this issue as soon as possible. Kindly reconsider your review

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: HI magnus ,We are very much sorry that our watch face disappoint you  ,would like to know further more from you,can you pls send us mail to wearables@insideglobe.com to Process your request .

title: Want refund

author: Ryan Clayton
comment: Super laggy animation and the ambient screen has a weird flicker.  Refunded.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Ryan,We apologize to you for facing this issue! WE would like to know further more from you send us mail to wearables@insideglobe.com to Process your request .Would you please refer your issues in detail (order id, OS in your android & watches)  Kindly reconsider your review

title: Laggy

author: Alexander Wells
comment: Definitely needs some work. Installed for Moto 360. It's a bit laggy when coming in and out of ambient mode. Also seems to really drain the battery. However, it's a beautiful face and currently a house favorite. Keep up the great work!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Randy, We are glad you liked our watch face and  we are trying to solve the battery problems then and there. We will soon update these things,Thank for your feedback

title: Great, but...

author: Artur Silva
comment: Unfortunately the moto 360 black bar hide the rest of the boat, but not enough to let the face to be beautiful. I did not see about battery or lag. Keep upgrading to make one of the best face in my watch :P

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue,we are covering these issue in our next update which will hit you soon, Thanks for your Feedback

author: Simon Furber
comment: Outright isn't working on my Huawei smartwatch. Lags like crazy switching between ambient and the time doesn't seem to tick whilst in ambient. Crashes every time it's not in ambient mode, tool me numerous restarts and quick fingers to change watch face before it crashed again.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Simon!We are very much sorry that our watch face disappoint you we are working on the Animation Lag issue soon it will be fixed in our future update which will hit you soon ,Thank you for your time

title: Looks nice. But...

author: Jason Newman
comment: Moto 360 v2. Maybe an issue with Wear, but the animation takes a few moments to start, and the watch grinds to a halt. I'll have to check again after a hard reset. Update: Even after wiping the phone and only leaving this watch face on it, still too slow to be useful. Pity.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jason! we apologies to you for facing this issue! We resolve your issues as soon as possible. Kindly reconsider your review

author: Luke Harrison
comment: Looks beautiful, just laggy like hell. Makes the watch so slow to respond even caused it to crash. Hopefully this'll get fixed in a tyre update but can't score highly currently

reply.content: Hi Luke! Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue. We'd like to look know further, from you to get it fixed  soon, Thanks for your Feedback

title: Love it

author: Romano DC
comment: Love it on my first gen moto 360. The leading zero in twelve hour mode should be removed though, It just looks wrong.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Leading Zero is removed now!! hope we fulfilled your demand...

title: Great.

author: Michael Carroll
comment: On the Moto 360 there is a yellow line going through the middle just above the clock and it would be nice to have the date on here at least but it is definitely a good concept. Update: this issue has been resolved but I'm still looking forward to having the date included in this app.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Michael,WE will take your suggestion and try to work on this in our next update which include date in it  ,Thank you for your support and kindly consider your rating.

title: Looks like a good idea but...

author: Mark Nealon
comment: Looks great but it's annoying that it switches to 12 hour if you touch the face. 12/24hr should be a setting.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: We have touched these things in our new update ,just tap the bottom half of the dial once.. check this for detailed instruction http://insideglobe.com/animated-watch-face/

author: Voyd Void
comment: Once the watch goes to ambient mode it shouldn't show the seconds. Just show the hour and the minutes. Otherwise it looks dumb.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Voyd,We will consider your proposition in our next update, Thanks for your Support

title: 24h mode looks bad in ambient mode

author: Eddie Quezada
comment: Only two suggestions would be to have a settings option to leave features "as is" once you like the configuration. The other is adding the date.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Date and Weather options are added.. Kindly check it now and also please reconsider your valuable review...

title: Love it!!

author: M Martin
comment: Great addition to my Android Wear collection.

title: Appreciate the originality :)

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Senastiaan! we apologies to you for facing this issue ,We have been covering these issue in our future update which will hit you soon ,Kindly keep in touch ,Thank you for the time

title: Nice but laggy

author: Behnam Rs

author: Damon Nagel

title: Draining battery...

author: Corry Holt
comment: 24 hour only

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: you can change 24 hour time format by just double tap on the upper half of the screen. The digits which shows the time, change its color to denote the unlocked status of the screen. To view the time in 12 hours format, just tap the bottom half of the dial once.. check this for detailed instruction http://insideglobe.com/animated-watch-face/
